text: Ani tumhi tyancyasi ladhanyakarita apalya ksamatenusara samarthya tayara kara ani ghode tayara thevanyacehi ki tyadvare tumhi allahacya satrunna ani apalya satrunna bhayabhita karu sakave, ani tyancyakherija itarannahi, jyanna tumhi janata nahita, allaha tyanna cangalya prakare janato ani je kahi allahacya margata kharca karala te tumhala purepura dile ja'ila ani tumacya hakkace nukasana kele janara nahi
